com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.device

Class BeaconDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.device.BeaconDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, IBeaconDevice, RemoteBluetoothDevice, java.lang.Comparable<IBeaconDevice>

    public class BeaconDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBeaconDevice
    Class representing a real beacon device. Please, note that in the SDK there is also another Device class (Device) which represents a JSON model for a device and is accessible while interacting with the REST Client.

      • of

        public static BeaconDevice of(IBeaconDevice beaconDevice,
                              ResolvedId resolvedId)
        Creates BeaconDevice from BeaconDevice and ResolvedId

        Should be used when resolving shuffled beacons manually

        Parameters:
        beaconDevice - source beacon device
        resolvedId - target resolved values
        Returns:
        new beacon device
